title: Pittsburgh Restaurant Week – Putting Pittsburgh Restaurants in the spotlight
content:
## Most Delicious Time Of Year

##### Dine out across the Pittsburgh region in this special semi-annual celebration

[**Facebook Event**](https://www.facebook.com/events/995241102101693/)

Be social and RSVP to the official Facebook event

[**Restaurant Roulette**](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/restaurants/restaurant-roulette/)

Let chance select your next restaurant week destination

title: Pittsburgh Restaurant Week to be revived – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content:
Pittsburgh Restaurant Week is back and we couldn’t be happier.  This winter will mark the first Pittsburgh Restaurant Week since May 2010 and showcase why Pittsburgh is a city deserving of a restaurant week event.

Details of the event are still being worked, so in the meantime, follow us on Twitter [@PgtRestaurantWk](http://twitter.com/PghRestaurantWk) for the latest developments.

Categories: [Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/)

* * *

title: General – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content:
###### [General](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/general/ "View all posts in General")

## [Tips for Pittsburgh Restaurant Week](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/tips-for-pittsburgh-restaurant-week/ "Tips for Pittsburgh Restaurant Week")

Excited to celebrate Pittsburgh Restaurant Week?  Here are some tips to ensure you get the most out of your restaurant week experience. Make reservations early, many of the most popular restaurants get booked up. If making a reservation by phone, be sure to mention Pittsburgh Restaurant Week when booking. Read [Read more…](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/tips-for-pittsburgh-restaurant-week/)

By [**Brian McCollum**](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/author/webmaster/ "Brian McCollum"), [6 years6 years ago](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/tips-for-pittsburgh-restaurant-week/)

###### [General](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/general/ "View all posts in General")

## [What exactly does Early Access mean?](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/what-are-bonus-days/ "What exactly does Early Access mean?")

What is Early Access? Restaurant Week has always been a Monday to Sunday 7-day celebration. In its early years, there was a Kickoff Party held on the Thursday beforehand as a lead-in to the week. “Bonus Days” fill the void in between by allowing the restaurants to opt to start [Read more…](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/what-are-bonus-days/)

By [**Brian McCollum**](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/author/admin-2/ "Brian McCollum"), [9 years6 years ago](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/what-are-bonus-days/)

[![](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/Slideshow7.png)](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/what-is-restaurant-week/ "What is Restaurant Week?")

###### [General](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/general/ "View all posts in General")

## [What is Restaurant Week?](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/what-is-restaurant-week/ "What is Restaurant Week?")

Restaurant Week is a event where Pittsburgh restaurants offer discounted lunch and/or dinner menus.  It is a unique opportunity to experience some of Pittsburgh’s finest restaurants without breaking the bank. Throughout the city, restaurants participate in “Restaurant Week” where they offer a special (like a three-course lunch for a fixed [Read more…](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/what-is-restaurant-week/)

By [**Brian McCollum**](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/author/admin-2/ "Brian McCollum"), [14 years13 years ago](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/general/what-is-restaurant-week/)

title: Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012 planning begins – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content:
Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012 is currently in the planning stages.  As the details are being worked out, sponsorship and funding is currently being sought.  If you are interested in supporting this event, please email [info@pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pghrestaurantwk](mailto:info@pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pghrestaurantwk)

Categories: [Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/)

title: Pittsburgh Restaurant Week begins January 16, 2012 – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content:
_![](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pghrestaurantwk/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/PRW_Logo_Jan2012.png)Pittsburgh Restaurant Week will span the dates January 16-22, 2012._

Pittsburgh Restaurant Week is a project of the Pittsburgh TasteBuds.  The goal of the event is to highlight the numerous and diverse dining options within the community to the greater Pittsburgh region.  Restaurant weeks are designed to help boost business during what is typically a slower time of the year.  Traditionally during restaurant week, restaurants offer prix-fixe meals to give diners the opportunity to experience the areas dining landscape without breaking the bank.

[Restaurant registration](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pghrestaurantwk/registration/) is currently open.

Categories: [Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/)

* * *

title: Chef Interview – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content:
###### [Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/ "View all posts in Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012")

## [Getting To Know Pittsburgh Chefs](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/getting-to-know-pittsburgh-chefs/ "Getting To Know Pittsburgh Chefs")

During July, Pittsburgh Restaurant Week would like to offer a “Getting To Know Pittsburgh Chefs” segment through online chef interviews on YouTube. It is meant to be an opportunity for the public to get to know area chefs and reveal what cooking, the restaurant week program, and community mean to them.

[(more…)](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/getting-to-know-pittsburgh-chefs/#more-1182)

By [**Brian McCollum**](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/author/admin-2/ "Brian McCollum"), [13 years13 years ago](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/getting-to-know-pittsburgh-chefs/)

title: Restaurant Registration now available online – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content:
Pittsburgh-area restaurants interested in participating in Pittsburgh Restaurant Week may sign-up using an online application.  After completion of the online registration, an event manager will contact each restaurant to confirm participation prior to publishing online.

**Online Restaurant Registration:**

[https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pghrestaurantwk/register/](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/pghrestaurantwk/register/)

Categories: [Featured](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/featured/)[Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/)

title: downtown pittsburgh – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content:

title: Tips for Getting the Most out of Pittsburgh Restaurant Week – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content:
Excited to celebrate Pittsburgh Restaurant Week?  Here are some tips to ensure you get the most out of your restaurant week experience.

- Make reservations early, many of the most popular restaurants get booked up. If making a reservation by phone, be sure to mention Pittsburgh Restaurant Week when booking **.**
- Read menus and reviews of participating restaurants. Restaurant Week is a great opportunity to experience the diverse restaurants available in Pittsburgh. Some restaurants offer pre-fixed menus as their restaurant week special, others offer a flat discount.
- Be aware that not all restaurants participating in Pittsburgh Restaurant Week offer the promotional menu at lunch AND dinner. When you make your reservation, you should confirm with the restaurant that they are participating in Restaurant Week. Some restaurants may have seats set aside for diners participating in the celebration.

_Ever attended a restaurant week before, in Pittsburgh or elsewhere?  Share your experiences and tell everyone about it by commenting below._

Categories: [Pittsburgh Restaurant Week 2012](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/pittsburgh-restaurant-week-2012/)[Subfeature](https://pittsburghrestaurantweek.com/category/subfeature/)

* * *
